reviewText: I so love this. I don't know why, but I do. The acting is awesome, the scenery is lovely, and the entire era comes alive like no dry history schoolbooks were ever able to portray. In the opening monologue it's made very clear that some of the following mini-series is based on provable fact and some on *stretched* fiction so I just took myself out of critical mode and enjoyed exactly what I was shown. I'm glad I bought *Centennial* and I watch it once a year. The fact that I would watch Timothy Dalton read the telephone book from Aaa to Zuz has nothing to do with my love for *Centennial*. :)
because I can not see in my dvd just in the computer

Es una serie de como se originaron los Estados Unidos, y que pude apreciar en 1976. Y que ahora, pasados varios aos, localice por Internet mediante el sitio de amazon. Y la espero para el 23 de diciembre de 2014.
Ahora, con el afn de seguir su tracking, quisiera me dieran a conocer su gua de seguimiento. Pues, solo aparece en la orden que fue enviado en la nave La POSTE.
